meaningMnemonic:
At the <kanji>extreme</kanji> <kanji>edge</kanji>, which is just the <vocabulary>extreme</vocabulary>.

極端 means something is taken to the extreme without moderation, so it generally has a negative connotation.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
